import React from 'react' import MasterCTA from '../atoms/controls/call-to-actions/abstractions/master-call-to-action' import startPathFinding from "../../algorithms/pathfind" import { dispatchedStoppedSearch } from '../../redux/dispatchs/settings-dispatchs' import { changeArraySize } from '../../helpers/state-functions/change-array-size' import {clearPath, clearAll } from '../../helpers/state-functions/clear-matrix' import "../../css/choicebox.css" import "../../css/button.css" import "../../css/slider.css" import "../../css/controls.css" export default function Controls() { return (
{await dispatchedStoppedSearch();await clearPath()}}>
{await dispatchedStoppedSearch(); await clearPath()}}>
{await dispatchedStoppedSearch(); await clearPath();}}>Clear Path { await startPathFinding(); }}>Play {await dispatchedStoppedSearch(); await clearAll() }}>Clear All
Size { await dispatchedStoppedSearch(); await changeArraySize(); }}>
Speed { }}>
) }
